title: Bug 12398: Accessibility problems
description: When launching the Help view, the tab key does not function until clicking on one of the 'live' areas (e.g., the banner with the tool buttons, the nav frame, or the content frame). We should start the Help view in a way that can be immediately navigated via the keyboard.
OB: When I launch the Help view, the tab key does not function.
EB: The Help view should allow immediate navigation via the keyboard.
SR: To reproduce, launch the Help view and observe that the tab key does not function. Also, click on one of the 'live' areas (banner with the tool buttons, nav frame, or content frame) and verify that the tab key starts working.
